com.marginallyclever.robotoverlord.makelangeloRobot

Class ImageManipulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marginallyclever.robotoverlord.makelangeloRobot.ImageManipulator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ImageConverter, ImageGenerator, LoadAndSaveDXF, LoadAndSaveImage, LoadAndSaveSVG

    public abstract class ImageManipulator
extends Object
    shared methods for image manipulation (generating, converting, or filtering)
    Author:
    Dan Royer

      • moveTo

        protected void moveTo(Writer out,
                      double x,
                      double y,
                      boolean up)
               throws IOException
        Create the gcode that will move the robot to a new position. It does not translate from image space to paper space.
        Parameters:
        out - where to write the gcode
        x - new coordinate
        y - new coordinate
        up - new pen state
        Throws:
        IOException - on write failure

      • lineTo

        protected void lineTo(Writer out,
                      double x,
                      double y,
                      boolean up)
               throws IOException
        This is a special case of moveTo() that only works when every line on the paper is a straight line.
        Parameters:
        out - where to write the gcode
        x - new coordinate
        y - new coordinate
        up - new pen state
        Throws:
        IOException - on write failure
